level.ecm_name: Passive Roof Top slab insulation Chamber Insulation - XPS 200mm
level.description: When there is a pitched roof that can be retrofitted by the interior it is used mineral wool to insulate all the floor from the top side in order to increase thermal performance.

level.application: - Where there is a pitched roof with access - Where there is also insulation inside the facade, internal wall insulation (optional) - Where there is any use in the pitched roof
level.advantages: - Energy saving: Low heat losses in cold periods and low heat gains in hot months. - Healthier environment, Comfort: No thermal bridges, and avoid the humidity. - Aesthetic internal performance - Cost: Cheap material and installation
level.disadvantages: - Thermal bridges: It can appear in the edges of the room or slab, must consider complementary measures to avoid this problem - Use: Pitched roof can not be use and must be ventilated
level.links_to_barriers: Maximum value roofs can grow internally
level.installation_data: 1.Remove possible objects that are interfering with the insulation. 2.Place with precision all insulation in all the area 3.Take special attention to edges with extra insulation
level.maintenance_data: No mayor maintenance apart from revision. Revision is important to find possible water infiltration in every roof.
